text: I know I need a down week after this
followed by a rebuilding week and then
on week four I can get back to real
training again after a 100 mile effort
and then in week two your motivation
changes and you get excited about
something and you get life energy and
the comparison to when I was feeling
terrible to now is huge it doesn't
change the fact that the original plan
sound your excitement does not help your
body heal it only helps your mind
believe you are healed and it is a very
